1.text: Pick out fresh corn with the husk still on.
1.vid: /e/e1/Microwave Corn on the Cob Step 1 Version 3.360p.mp4

3.text: Place the ears in the microwave.

4.vid: /c/cf/Microwave Corn on the Cob Step 3 Version 3.360p.mp4

5.text: Remove the corn from the microwave and let it rest.
5.vid: /7/74/Microwave Corn on the Cob Step 4 Version 3.360p.mp4

6.vid: /c/c1/Microwave Corn on the Cob Step 5 Version 3.360p.mp4

7.vid: /c/c7/Microwave Corn on the Cob Step 6 Version 3.360p.mp4

8.vid: /9/9a/Microwave Corn on the Cob Step 8 Version 3.360p.mp4

9.vid: /9/94/Microwave Corn on the Cob Step 10 Version 3.360p.mp4

10.vid: /e/eb/Microwave Corn on the Cob Step 11 Version 3.360p.mp4

11.text: Remove the corn from the microwave and let it cool.

12.text: Season it with butter, salt and pepper for a traditional American and Canadian approach.
12.vid: /f/f1/Microwave Corn on the Cob Step 9 Version 3.360p.mp4
